page.title: 08 Matthews Day (cont.)
page.content: I have sandwiches which are kept in an old ice-cream box.Inside I have an old tub with sultanas in.I have one sandwich with cucumber spread in white bread,and one with cheese spread in brown bread.I have a raw carrot,a piece of cheese and a "special" like a chocolate biscuit or bag of crisps. Also in a blue plastic flask I have water or squash. After lunch we go out to play until 1:30.We usually play a chasing game or a game with a ball. In the afternoons we have Science,History,Geography, Games or Art.We clear up ready to go home at 3:15.Sometimes we stay for Clubs. I meet my mum and we walk home,then watch childrens television until it's over.We have supper when my dad comes home and a game with him afterwards.At 9:00 I go to bed and read until 9:30.
